code: "use client";import React from"react";import ActionButton from"./ActionButton";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StudentCard=_ref=>{let{student}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"bg-light rounded-3 p-3 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between gap-3 flex-wrap mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:student.avatar||"https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=Unknown",alt:"Student Avatar",className:"rounded-circle",style:{width:"40px",aspectRatio:"1",objectFit:"contain"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-0",style:{fontSize:"10px",color:"rgb(97, 97, 97)"},children:student.faculty}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-0 mt-1",style:{fontSize:"16px"},children:student.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-0 mt-1",style:{fontSize:"12px",color:"rgb(97, 97, 97)"},children:student.id})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-secondary",style:{fontSize:"16px"},children:student.scholarshipType}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActionButton,{label:"Detail",iconClass:"bi-info-circle",variant:"info"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActionButton,{label:"Update",iconClass:"bi-pencil",variant:"primary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActionButton,{label:"Delete",iconClass:"bi-trash",variant:"danger"})]})]});};export default StudentCard;
